snippet.title: Gameplay Trailer - Please, Don't Touch Anything: House Broken
snippet.description:
Please, Don't Touch Anything: House Broken is an all-new mind-bending evolution in the hit puzzle game series. Unleash chaos in your home! Resist the Big Red Button! But when curiosity strikes,15 unpredictable house-breaking endings await. 

Play in mixed reality for a blend of the real and unreal, or enjoy full VR mode, or better yet try both! From simple to devious puzzles - explore, interact, and embrace the truly unexpected! 

Buy it today for Meta Quest 2, 3, or Pro! https://www.meta.com/experiences/5898540580263835/
